trans-unit.source: Provides control capability to validate that another control's value matches a provided regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 提供控件功能以验证该另一个控件的值与提供的正则表达式匹配。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This class behaves identically to the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: 此类行为相同，对 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator?displayProperty=fullName>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> controls on a form raise validator controls on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>窗体上的控件引发窗体以在窗体提交到服务器时执行验证的验证程序控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: To disable automatic validation, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用自动验证，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>到`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Virtual method for derived class to create its own aggregated Web validator.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类创建其自己的聚合的 Web 验证程序的虚拟方法。

trans-unit.source: The Web validator is for getting and setting of the common properties of Web base validator.
trans-unit.target: 该 Web 验证程序用于获取和设置 Web 基本验证程序的常见属性。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: An aggregated Web validator.
trans-unit.target: 聚合的 Web 验证程序。

trans-unit.source: Called during the validation stage when ASP.NET processes a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当 ASP.NET 处理 Web 页时，在验证阶段调用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validator is valid, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果验证程序有效，否则， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the regular expression assigned to be the validation criteria.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定验证条件的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression assigned to be the validation criteria.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式指定验证条件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator"></xref> does not perform validation on an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator"> </xref>不在空字符串时执行验证。

trans-unit.source: To test for an empty string, use the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator"></xref> controls together.
trans-unit.target: 若要测试是否为空字符串，请使用<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator"></xref>和<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RegularExpressionValidator"></xref>控制在一起。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression assigned was malformed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的正则表达式的格式错误。
